shortHero.heroDesc: We are the pre-eminent voice of an industry.

callouts.title: What we do
callouts.cat1desc: We host hundreds of programs a year so members can network with other professionals and learn from industry influencers.
callouts.cat2desc: Our certifications, online webinars and event workshops help members learn and demonstrate professional excellence.
callouts.cat3desc: We build relationships and dialogue with decision makers in the public sector. This keeps our members' interests part of policy discussions.
